subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Usain Bolt pointed to the sky in his signature victory pose as he returned to his native Jamaica. Fans crowded the international airport to welcome Bolt, who won three gold medals at the Beijing Games. He was also greeted by dignitaries including Prime Minister Bruce Golding.
